problems.title: Regulatory Compliance Document Analyzer
problems.summary: Audit filings with extraction, validation, gap analysis, and risk scoring loops.
problems.problem: Build a regulatory compliance analyzer that ingests filings (10-K, 10-Q, prospectuses), extracts key sections, checks SEC/Basel/MiFID rules, runs gap + risk scoring loops, and outputs an audit-ready report.

problems.title: Research Paper Quality Pipeline
problems.summary: Validate citations, methodology, originality, and formatting before issuing verdicts.
problems.problem: Create a research paper pipeline that analyzes structure, validates citations, reviews methodology, improves clarity, checks plagiarism and journal standards, scores quality, and issues accept/revise/reject guidance.

problems.title: Financial Earnings Intelligence
problems.summary: Parse transcripts + filings, cross-check metrics, and produce analyst-ready briefs.
problems.problem: Develop an earnings intelligence workflow that parses call transcripts and filings, extracts key metrics, analyzes sentiment, compares peers, flags anomalies, validates numbers, and drafts bull/bear theses plus alerts.

problems.title: Multi-Channel Marketing Generator
problems.summary: Turn briefs into messaging, assets, brand/legal checks, A/B tests, and predictions.
problems.problem: Design a marketing generator that transforms a brief into audience insights, messaging frameworks, multi-format assets, brand/legal validation loops, A/B test design, and performance estimates.

problems.title: Intelligent Customer Support Orchestrator
problems.summary: Classify tickets, search KB, draft responses, score confidence, and learn.
problems.problem: Build a support orchestrator that classifies tickets, pulls customer history, searches the KB, drafts personalized responses, scores confidence, escalates when necessary, validates tone/accuracy, and updates the KB with new resolutions.
